product_name: Camaro Aqua Skin Neo Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Dress for success while paddling, kayaking, surfing or sailing. The Camaro Aqua Skin Neo top uses lightweight, stretchy neoprene to keep you covered and comfortable in and out of the water. Quick-drying neoprene offers comfortable coverage and light insulation for continued warmth in and out of the water. Closeout.
short_description: Dress for success while paddling, kayaking, surfing or sailing. The Camaro Aqua Skin Neo top uses lightweight, stretchy neoprene to keep you covered and comfortable in and out of the water.
